ol.li:
Contains exactly one [1..1] relatedGoalCategory with data type Code
Indicates how the "target Order" is related to the "source Order". Examples include Parent, Child, Replaces, Replaced By, etc.
Contains exactly one [1..1] goal, where its type is Goal
